tidal.midnightconfig.title: Tidal Config
tidal.midnightconfig.reloadReminder: You may need to reload your chunks for changes to take affect!
tidal.midnightconfig.chunkRadius.tooltip: The chunk radius of chunks that should spawn waves. Reduce this number if your struggling for performance!
tidal.midnightconfig.chunkUpdatesRescanA: The amount of block updates that should happen in a chunk before it is rescanned for wave spawning.
tidal.midnightconfig.debug.tooltip: Helpful for figuring out where waves are spawning, and how.
tidal.midnightconfig.debugDocsSite: - Green particles are SitePos', they should only spawn along shore
tidal.midnightconfig.debugDocsSpyglassHo: - Spyglass in hotbar to see all scanned water blocks, color coded per closest SitePos
tidal.midnightconfig.debugDocsSpyglass: - Hold spyglass to see debug waves on wave spawn
tidal.midnightconfig.debugDocsClock: - Hold compass to see wave directions for current chunk, offhand to for all nearby chunks
tidal.midnightconfig.debugDocsCompass: - Offhand clock to see spawning positions of waves
